repository.note: There is no default package repository, this is implied in the namespace using the go get command conventions. In practice the go module proxy acts as a public defulat repository.

subpath_definition.note: The subpath is used to point to a subpath inside a package.

note: the current definition predates Go modules and has several practical problems, and in particular it is impossible to determine what is a module and what is a package short of having full access to the source code or making an API call to the Go module proxy.

version_definition.note: The version is often empty when a commit is not specified and should be the commit in most cases when available.
